Name: Pump Station 104
Description: Main water distribution pump for Riverside district. Primary pump delivering 5000 GPM at 150 PSI. Critical asset for district water supply with redundant backup systems.

Name: Valve Assembly 201
Description: Main pressure regulation valve for north sector. Motorized butterfly valve with actuator. Controls pressure differential between transmission and distribution systems.

Name: Generator G301
Description: Emergency standby generator for South Treatment Plant. Diesel-powered 500kW unit provides backup power during utility outages. Automatic transfer switch with 10-second startup.

Name: Storage Tank 401
Description: Primary elevated water storage tank serving east distribution zone. 1 million gallon capacity. Steel construction with interior epoxy coating. Provides emergency storage and pressure stabilization.

Name: Flow Sensor Array 601
Description: Ultrasonic flow meter array at Treatment Facility influent. Non-invasive clamp-on sensors measuring incoming flow. Provides critical data for treatment process control and billing.
